description.narrative: To strengthen the health sector by means of improving referral services as well as the supervisory capacity of the Ministry of Health. Each hospital supervises rural clinics operating in the respective catchment area.

participating-org.narrative: HSRP Health VI Ministry of Health and Social Welfare
